Package control

Class PriceFileManager

java.lang.Object
control.PriceFileManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
PriceManager, Serializable
public class PriceFileManager extends Object implements PriceManager, Serializable
The Price File Manager which is able to read, edit and show prices of the different movies

This class handles the CRUD operations of the Price File Manager, our databse being a CSV file

Author:
Lin Kai
